metadata.description: Unified ACP client and evaluation harness. Connect to ACP-compatible agents programmatically, capture full trajectories (tools, thoughts, plans), and pipe to downstream analysis tools.

plugins.name: eval-harness
plugins.description: ACP client and evaluation harness for TypeScript/Bun projects. Includes: createACPClient for programmatic agent access, run-harness.ts for trajectory capture, and LLM-as-judge evaluation templates. Requires Bun runtime.
